modified splash screen. draws but not scaled.

doesn't crash anymore

just commenting some methods relating to mana and card play (:
changed how keeping track of mana works
refactored some stuff.

Added *an amount* of updating for PlayAreas

Trying to get the core gameplay working! :D :D :D (none of it works hlep pls)

Refactored HeroCardGameController for attacking heroes and other cards. Changed Board to take Hero array into its constructor to allow for this.
